title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to ‘Open WebUI’) with chat history, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat sessions and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU & GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and model management.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API with ESM support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, importable as github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration using Socket-Mode to talk to Ollama models privately or in channels.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-based process management and streaming.
